ol.li: Set Up Your Services: Navigate to Sales > Products and set up your coaching services.
Configure Appointment Types: In the Appointment app, create types that match your services.
Manage Your Calendar: Use the Calendar app to block off your availability and personal time.
Create Client Profiles: As you get inquiries, add them to your CRM and Contacts.
Start Tracking Projects: For services that require ongoing management, create a project in the Project app.
Invoice Your Clients: Use the Invoicing app to bill clients for completed services.
